correction_reason: Previous weights incorrectly marked TOTAL as INSUFFICIENT confidence despite 66.7% win rate vs SPREAD at 47.5%. This caused quality regression.

SPREAD.rationale: Below 50% threshold - needs downweight to suppress weak performer

MONEYLINE.rationale: 0% historical win rate for TOTAL - keep disabled

TOTAL.rationale: Strong performer at 66.7% win rate, 19.2% above SPREAD. Sample size n=15 is sufficient for high confidence (>0.5 expected frequency). Feb 15 achieved 80% with these bets.

historical_context.analysis: Feb 16 SPREAD spike (64.3%) was single-day variance, proved by Feb 17 crash (33.3%). TOTAL remained stable at 60-80% across all dates. Cumulative 66.7% is reliable signal.

instructions: Use these weights in bet_ranker.py when calculating LARLScore. TOTAL weight of 1.3x will restore high-edge TOTAL bets to top 10 positions, improving expected win rate to 55%+ within 24 hours.
